actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A resolution relating to the need for immediate action by the Secretary of Agriculture to accelerate efforts to develop renewable resources as a source of energy.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Agriculture act now, under the authority of existing law, to implement research, information, and loan programs to develop advanced technology and production facilities for obtaining energy from agricultural commodities produced by United States farmers and other renewable resources.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the need for immediate action by the Secretary of Agriculture to accelerate efforts to develop renewable resources as a source of energy.
